parameters.name: WitnessIndex
parameters.description: Index of the linear dimension extension line to jog

parameters.name: Jogged
parameters.description: True whether the linear dimension extension is jogged, false if not

parameters.name: Offset1
parameters.description: First line segment of the linear dimension extension line

parameters.name: Offset2
parameters.description: Second line segment of the linear dimension extension line; this is the line segment to jog

parameters.name: Offset1to2
parameters.description: Distance by which to offset Offset1 and Offset2 for the jog

title: IDisplayDimension.SetJogParameters
description: Set the linear dimension extension line to be jogged.
signature:
System.Boolean SetJogParameters( 
   System.Int16
WitnessIndex
,
   System.Boolean
Jogged
,
   System.Double
Offset1
,
   System.Double
Offset2
,
   System.Double
Offset1to2
)

parameters.name: WitnessIndex
parameters.description: Index of the linear dimension extension line to jog

parameters.name: Jogged
parameters.description: True whether the linear dimension extension is jogged, false if not

parameters.name: Offset1
parameters.description: First line segment of the linear dimension extension line

parameters.name: Offset2
parameters.description: Second line segment of the linear dimension extension line; this is the line segment to jog

parameters.name: Offset1to2
parameters.description: Distance by which to offset Offset1 and Offset2 for the jog

remarks:
Call
IModelView::GraphicsRedraw
after calling this method to redraw the graphics area.

examples.title: Add and Offset Dimension Lines Jogs (VBA)
